description:
A free, informal workshop session led by members of Bell Phillips Architects for children to build their own model lantern, inspired by The Tree House, and learn about architecture. 

Drop in any time between 3-5pm.

factsheet.heading: Introduction to The Tree House
paragraphs: We’d like to introduce you to our brand-new community space, The Tree House at Elephant Park.
As its name suggests, you can climb high up into the treetops, and look out from its roof terrace across the park and surrounding area.
The space is for everyone, and we hope you enjoy spending time here in this special place.

factsheet.heading: Purpose
paragraphs: The Tree House at Elephant Park is a community space for everyone to enjoy.

Within the building is a room which can be booked for events. There is a brand-new café kiosk which Hana Coffee will be operating from, and there are public toilets which will be open during the operational hours of nearby Elephant Springs.

On the top of the building is a large publicly accessible roof terrace which can be accessed by two staircases or a lift. The roof terrace brings visitors up into the treetops of the park and is a space for relaxing and taking in the view across the park and surrounding area.

factsheet.heading: Design & Build
paragraphs: The Tree House has been designed by Bell Phillips Architects and is inspired by the surrounding landscape of the park.
It celebrates the existing trees in the park, through its main material being timber, and also by the way the building wraps around one of them.
At Elephant Park we take sustainability very seriously and it was important for The Tree House to reflect these values in its design and construction.
The building is made from a material called cross-laminated-timber. This is a renewable resource, and so a highly sustainable choice.

The building has been designed so that everyone is welcome to use and enjoy it, and therefore is fully accessible. There is a lift for accessing the roof terrace and there are fully accessible public toilet facilities.

factsheet.heading: Lendlease & Community Spaces
paragraphs: The Tree House is the latest addition to Elephant Park’s variety of community spaces throughout the development.
Everybody is welcome at The Tree House whether you’re relaxing on your own, meeting friends or making new ones.
